name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in delivering AI/ML-powered applications. Skilled in leveraging **AI**, **data labeling**, and advanced **programming** techniques to enhance predictive analytics and automation. Adept in using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** with comprehensive expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Demonstrated ability to implement complex mathematical algorithms within applications, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in data processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and experienced in architecting microservices, event-driven systems, and robust CI/CD pipelines. Committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring all solutions meet essential standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Strong background in MLOps, encompassing model training, serving, and orchestration with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Excellent analytical writing and communication skills, enabling effective collaboration and fact-checking to enhance project outcomes.
